name: Schrödinger's cat Revenge
description:
Schrödinger's cat Revenge is puzzle game where player must pay cat's life for carrying on in game. BUT this cat isn't any ordinary cat, it's cat which escaped the box, yes, THE box, and...she have trousers.

Try complete all challenging puzzles this game have to offer, and show that you are the true Schrödinger's cat.

And if you ask, Will be the cat alive at the end of the game? We don't know, she will be dead and live at the same time.
